docs.text: Crowe operational analytics ¶ COA Introduction ¶ Crowe Operational Analytics is a robust enterprise reporting and analytics solution designed by a team of seasoned functional and technical professionals with deep expertise in analytics and in the manufacturing and metals industry. Metals companies' transactional data hidden just below the surface can provide the intelligence and insight required to make the right critical business decisions. Crowe Operational Analytics provides the ability to extract this intelligence, enabling companies to maximize margin and minimize cost, uncover root causes of product quality issues, compare customer trends across different products, alloys, and specifications. The tool displays these insights with out-of-the-box dashboards using Microsoft Power BI, a Gartner Magic Quadrant leader. With a dashboard for each area of your business, you have the ability to filter and refine the data by business, location, alloy, grade, shape, and more. Quickly understand the latest sales trends and customer demand using your critical attributes. Drill down to uncover new opportunities for production optimization or identify quality-issue root causes. The COA analytics solution consists of three components: Kimball-style data warehouse hosted in Azure Advanced reporting data models Power BI dashboards and reports Microsoft Power BI ¶ Power BI is a business analytics solution that lets you visualize your data and share insights across your organization, or embed them in your app or website. Connect to hundreds of data sources and bring your data to life with live dashboards and reports. Power BI consists of: A Windows desktop application called Power BI Desktop. An online SaaS (Software as a Service) service called the Power BI Service. Power BI Mobile Apps for Windows, iOS, and Android devices. I'm an inline-style link
docs.title: Home

Quickly understand the latest sales trends and customer demand using your critical attributes. Drill down to uncover new opportunities for production optimization or identify quality-issue root causes. The COA analytics solution consists of three components: Kimball-style data warehouse hosted in Azure Advanced reporting data models Power BI dashboards and reports

docs.text: Power BI is a business analytics solution that lets you visualize your data and share insights across your organization, or embed them in your app or website. Connect to hundreds of data sources and bring your data to life with live dashboards and reports. Power BI consists of: A Windows desktop application called Power BI Desktop. An online SaaS (Software as a Service) service called the Power BI Service. Power BI Mobile Apps for Windows, iOS, and Android devices.
docs.title: Microsoft Power BI
